content: *perfect for spring this bunny softie is also a wonderful item for your child s easter basket lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 80095ad skill level easy vanna s choice® article #860 1 ball *shown in chocolate* crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm split ring stitch markers 2 plastic safety eyes 9 mm diameter 10 in 25 5 cm of ribbon small amounts of black and pink yarn fiberfill stuffing worked in continuous rounds from the top of the head to the bottom of the body some construction required to finish
